p: The key factors of impact and magnitude of COVID-19 epidemic is not fully known, but in analysis of WHO committee in China had drawn some conclusions on transmission of COVID-19 ( Aylward and Liang, 2020). This committee mentioned 25% of infection possibly done through pre-symptomatic individuals, transmission might occur in households, and there is no evidence available for re-infection after patient recovered. In Woelfel et al. (2020), German scholars highlighted viral shedding can possibly occur after several days or few weeks of recovery. All these factors could affects the alterations in R 0 value.
